headline: Roku and Amazon ads, Warner Bros. cable split: Trending Tickers
summary: Roku (ROKU) stock is surging after it announced a partnership with Amazon's (AMZN) ads team to create the largest CTV footprint in the US. Bondholders approved the Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) split, dividing the company's streaming and studio businesses from its cable segment. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.

headline: Warner Bros. Discovery Announces Receipt of Requisite Consents for Proposed Amendments in Cash Tender Offer and Consent Solicitation
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc. (NASDAQ: WBD) ("Warner Bros. Discovery," "WBD," the "Company," "we," "our" or "us") today announced that the Requisite Consents have been received to adopt the Proposed Amendments pursuant to its previously-announced cash tender offers and consent solicitations.
